p: Both current and future suitable areas for M. harttii are mostly within the Preservation Area for this species, with exception of Todos os Santos Bay, Bahia State (Figs 2, 3 and 4C). The two scenarios of future (year 2100) distribution of the species showed bathymetric expansion towards deeper areas, mainly in the southern portion of its distribution, with a latitudinal restriction by the loss of suitable areas in its northernmost limits (Figs 3 and 4; Table 2).
